data.eml:eml: Psoraaltotibetica (Psoraceae, Lecanorales), a new lichen species from the Tibetan part of the Himalayas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Timdal, Einar, Obermayer, Walter, Bendiksby, Mika (2016): Psoraaltotibetica (Psoraceae, Lecanorales), a new lichen species from the Tibetan part of the Himalayas. MycoKeys 13: 35-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.13.8824, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.13.8824
